a.detail:
Rune of Dread: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 10 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

c.detail: A stream of water cuts across the corridor
c.summary: A stream of water cuts across the corridor

e.detail:
Net Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 11 save or become restrained

i.detail: A 15-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor
i.summary: A 15-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

m.detail: An acrid odor fills the corridor
m.summary: An acrid odor fills the corridor

n.detail: The walls here have been engraved with endless spirals
n.summary: The walls here have been engraved with endless spirals

r.detail: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls
r.summary: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls

s.detail: The scent of ozone fills the corridor
s.summary: The scent of ozone fills the corridor

u.detail:
Arrow Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +5 to hit against one target, 1d10 piercing damage

v.detail:
Scythe Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +8 to hit against all targets within a 5 ft. arc, 2d10 slashing damage

w.detail:
Teleporter Crystal: DC 20 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the crystal, DC 10 save or be teleported to another location

z.detail: A mouldy odor fills the corridor
z.summary: A mouldy odor fills the corridor

details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a lair. Its creators were destroyed by a terrible discovery, and the dungeon has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)
details.temperature:
Cold (DC 10 Constitution save each hour
    or gain one level of exhaustion)

detail.room_features: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the east wall, and mysterious levers and mechanisms cover the east wall

east.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)

north.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
north.trap:
Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 11 save or take 1d10 damage

south.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp) (slides down)

west.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)
west.secret: The door is concealed within an upright sarcophagus

detail.room_features: A set of demonic war masks hangs on the north wall, and the floor is covered with stone rubble
